text: Fight and Smile (相信希望fight & smile賑災募款晚會) was a fund raising campaign held in Taiwan for the victims of the Japan 2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami. The event was held from March 17 to March 18, 2011. About NT$788 million were raised by the event. The event was hosted by Jacky Wu, Chang Fei (張菲), Chang Hsiao-yen (張小燕) and Patty Hou. ==Participants== About 300 celebrities participated in the event, including: {| |- |valign=top| * A-mei * Stefanie Sun * Jody Chiang * Mike He * Vivian Hsu * Ken Chu * Hui Xu-jie (許傑輝) * Lu Chen (劉謙) * Ella Chen * Chie Tanaka |valign=top| * Dee Shu * Jerry Yan * Wu Bai * Fahrenheit * Hidetoshi Nakata * Pai Bing-bing * Hsu Nai-lin (徐乃麟) * Li Jing * SMAP * Wang Bun-yun (黃品源) |valign=top| * Kay Huang (黃韻玲) * Wang Wei- zhong (王偉忠) * JJ Lin * Blackie * Van Fan * Lin Chi-ling (from remote) * Jolin Tsai (from remote) * Jay Chou (from remote) * Show Lo (from remote) * Selina Ren (from remote) |} ==See also== * Artistes 311 Love Beyond Borders ==References== * 相信希望募款晚會 * * * * * * Category:2011 in Taiwan Category:2011 Tōhoku earthquake and tsunami relief Category:Charity events
title: Fight and Smile
